intro:
The forest is peaceful
 as you stride through,

On a journey
 of your own,

lost in a sea
 of thoughts.

All of a sudden,
 you come across a
 discarded journal.

You notice it's
 covered in dirt and
 looks quite old.

The front cover reads:
 Talo's Quests!

intro2:
Being the curious creature
 that you are
